languages.text: "Губители душ вернулись! Кхейн, наполни яростью наши сердца!"
"The soul destroyers are back! Khaine, fill our hearts with fury!"
languages.original_text: "Губители душ вернулись! Кхейн, наполни яростью наши сердца!"

traits.locale_text: "The soul destroyers are back! Khein, fill our hearts with fury!"
"The soul destroyers are back! Khein, fill our hearts with fury!"
"The soul destroyers are back! Khein, fill our hearts with fury!"
"The soul destroyers are back! Khein, fill our hearts with fury!"
"The soul destroyers are back! Khaine, fill our hearts with fury!"
"The soul destroyers are back! Khaine, fill our hearts with fury!"

languages.text: “那些毁灭灵魂的人回来了！血手凯恩啊，让我们的心灵充满狂怒吧！”
languages.original_text: "The soul destroyers are back! Khaine, fill our hearts with fury!"

traits.locale_text: “那些毁灭灵魂的人回来了！血手凯恩啊，让我们的心灵充满狂怒吧！”

languages.text: "Die Seelenzerstörer sind zurück! Khaine, füllt unsere Herzen mit Zorn!"
languages.original_text: "The soul destroyers are back! Khaine, fill our hearts with fury!"

traits.locale_text: "Die Seelenzerstörer sind zurück! Khein, füllt unsere Herzen mit Zorn!"

languages.text: «¡Los destructores de almas han regresado! ¡Khaine, imbuye nuestros corazones de tu cólera!».
languages.original_text: "The soul destroyers are back! Khaine, fill our hearts with fury!"

traits.locale_text: «¡Los destructores de almas han regresado! ¡Khein, imbuye nuestros corazones de tu cólera!».

languages.text: « Revoilà les destructeurs d'âmes ! Khaine, emplis nos cœurs de fureur ! »
languages.original_text: "The soul destroyers are back! Khaine, fill our hearts with fury!"

traits.locale_text: « Revoilà les destructeurs d'âmes ! Khein, emplis nos cœurs de fureur ! »

languages.text: 「魂のデストロイヤーが帰ってきた！カイン、我らの心を怒りで満たせ！」
languages.original_text: "The soul destroyers are back! Khaine, fill our hearts with fury!"

traits.locale_text: 「魂のデストロイヤーが帰ってきた！カイン、我らの心を怒りで満たせ！」

languages.text: "Ruh yok edenler geri döndü! Khaine, yüreklerimizi öfkeyle doldur!"
languages.original_text: "The soul destroyers are back! Khaine, fill our hearts with fury!"

traits.locale_text: "Ruh yok edenler geri döndü! Khaine, yüreklerimizi öfkeyle doldur!"
